channel.title: Need help with Compile
channel.description:
I use IcyScapev2 and i wanna compile but that doesn't work, i have Laptop HP Compaq 6730s Windows 7 Ultimate 32-bit
My java update is 30. "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_30\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause
Where i must put my client??? i put cache to disc C. When i wanna solo play its work,but i wanna Add name to my server background,and add it to my ip :)) Please for Fast help:) Thanks Raper;)

item.title: Need help with Compile
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

try

@eco off title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_30\bin\java.exe" *.java pause
^^change this in the compiler.bat

  • changing background on client should be in the sprites folder
    -adding your ip would be in client.java, Egui.java, launch.java or gui.java use ctrl +F and search for server and replace the ips to your no-ip NOTE: this will only allow others to login. If you gonna make it with no-ip just make another copy of the client folder and replace the ips in that 1

Read full topic
